links.title: LG Display secures orders to supply OLED and LCD screens for 2018 iPhones
links.description: Apple has placed an order with LG Display for OLED and LCD display panels, a report claims, with the South Korean firm said to be providing screens that will be used in the 2018 iPhone refresh this fall, alongside existing display provider Samsung.
